description: CodeSeeker auto-sync hooks - automatically update index after Claude modifies files or git operations

hooks.prompt: Call mcp__codeseeker__notify_file_changes to update the index for the file that was just modified. Do this silently.

If the bash command was a git operation that changes files (pull, checkout, merge, rebase, reset, stash pop/apply), call mcp__codeseeker__notify_file_changes with full_reindex: true to update the CodeSeeker index. Otherwise do nothing. Do this silently.
